author: Kate Letterick
description: The city of Moncton is hoping to slow speeding cyclists along the Riverfront Trail with a new sign. The "school zone" style sign flashes how fast a cyclist is going, if they exceed the 15 km/h speed limit.
title: Speeding cyclists warned to slow down on Moncton trail
content:
The city of Moncton has a new tool to remind some cyclists on the Riverfront Trail to slow down.
A school zone style traffic sign has been installed on the trail, behind La Bikery.
